column4: I've had No luck getting iTunes to work and Yes it hardly works in WinBLows, but I have a ipod touch and it will not work with anything but iTunes, from what I have been told.
If anyone know figures that trick out, I'll sell the BRAND new Asus laptop that is sitting folded closed sitting 3 feet to my left as I'll have No reason to own it.
I'll admit that I'm a bit lost on running virtual machines
why? have you tried VMWare server?
